pli-tv-pvr3:2.4: This renders _tesaṁ sabhāgadhammānaṁ_. The point seems to be that the names _anicca_, etc., mentioned above, are not even known if a Buddha does not arise.
pli-tv-pvr3:3.4: Reading _sabrahmake_ as a shorthand for _sabrahmake loke_.
pli-tv-pvr3:10.1: Starting with the first offense entailing expulsion, here are the headings for the thirteen categories of origination, that is, offences that are _like_ the first _pārājika_, etc.
pli-tv-pvr3:13.1: Bu Pj 1, and Bu Ss 1 and 2.
pli-tv-pvr3:15.1: Bi Pj 5, and Bi Ss 3 and 5.
pli-tv-pvr3:25.3: Counting according to the commentary, I get seventy-one, not seventy.
pli-tv-pvr3:28.4: Sp 5.260: _Ubhinnaṁ dūtakena cāti “cīvaracetāpannaṁ upakkhaṭaṁ hotī”ti āgatasikkhāpadadvayañca_, “_Ubhinnaṁ dūtakena ca_: and the two rules on ‘has set aside a robe fund’ that are handed down.” In other words, _ubhinnaṁ_ refers to both [pli-tv-bu-vb-np8:1.1.32.1]() and [pli-tv-bu-vb-np9:1.36.1]().
pli-tv-pvr3:36.2: Bu Ss 13, and Bu Pc 64 and 69.
